artefact: Tell Us Once: report a death

artefact.overview: Contact your local register office, then use the Tell Us Once service to report a death to government and local councils.
artefact.more_information:
%You need to [register the death](/after-a-death/register-the-death "Register a death") before you use this service.%

You'll be given a unique Tell Us Once reference number, which you will need to log in to the service.

You will be asked information about the deceased, including:

- death certificate details - you get this when the death is registered
- their National Insurance number
- date of birth
- details of any benefits and services they were getting

^Tell Us Once is available in most local councils in England, Scotland and Wales.^
artefact.introduction: You must first register the death with your local register office. They will then tell you what to do next and how to use the Tell Us Once service.
